product_name: CliniqueMoisture Surge Lip Hydro-Plump Treatment Lip Balm
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Moisture Surge Lip Hydro-Plump Treatment is a multi-tasking treatment lip balm that smooths, relieves dryness, and preps for soft, dewy lips.
details: DetailsBenefitsDelivers plumping hydration and nourishment for soft and supple lipsThis anytime, multi-tasking treatment instantly moisturizes, smooths, and preps lips for makeupDermatologist testedAllergy testedKey IngredientsFormulated with nourishing ingredients like lipids, shea butter, and ceramidesFormulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesFragranceItem 2549347How To UseApply lip balm day and night. Use for an instant boost of hydration and for makeup prep. Can be used as an overnight mask, or as a 5-minute mask to condition lips before lipstick application.IngredientsPetrolatum, Polybutene, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Tocopheryl Acetate, Pvp/Hexadecene Copolymer, Silica , Hydrogenated Castor Oil, PPG-51/Smdi Copolymer, Caprylic/Capric/Myristic/Stearic Triglyceride, Ceramide Ng, Astrocaryum Murumuru Seed Butter, Sea Whip Extract, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Cholesterol, Caprylyl Glycol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, C12-16 Alcohols, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Palmitic Acid, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply lip balm day and night. Use for an instant boost of hydration and for makeup prep. Can be used as an overnight mask, or as a 5-minute mask to condition lips before lipstick application.
ingredients: Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients

reviews.headline: Definitely
reviews.comments: I had surgery on my lips and this help tremendously with the new skin

reviews.headline: I love it! I will buy another one!
reviews.comments: My lips keep on moisturizing and don't dry out! This the best thing I ever bought for my lips!

reviews.headline: I would only change one thingâ€¦
reviews.comments: Despite its high price tag I absolutely love this lip treatment! I have dry/peely lips and am SO picky about texture, but the moisture surge line is consistently my saving grace. This balm is ACTUALLY hydrating, and lightweight w/o feeling runny. You really don't need to use much of this product to see great results! My only suggestion is a different applicator.. such as a half pointed silicone tip of sorts. But that's just my preference :-)

reviews.headline: Absolute miracle worker
reviews.comments: I moved to MA 4 years ago, and literally every single day spent within this state, i have had terrible chapped lips. Cracking and peeling year-round summer included. I've tried every ointment, vaseline, chapstick, lip treatment on the market and nothing made a big enough difference. Until this baby. Ive had it only a few weeks, and the improvement has been incredible. I now only really need to use it at night, and my lips have barely peeled at all since using it. It is absolutely expensive I know, but it is worth every single cent. Excuse me while i buy 9 more.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: Love how it glides on making my lips look and feel smooth

reviews.headline: No more dry lips
reviews.comments: I love this lip moisturizer. You have dry, chapped lips or just want to have great looking lips this is for you. Don't go to sleep without this.

reviews.headline: Kinda thick
reviews.comments: I bought this because I thought it would help with my dry lips. It did for a day. Then they got worst. I have no idea why.

reviews.headline: Only thing that helped my dry cracked lips !
reviews.comments: I was struggling so bad with dry, cracked lips and I got this on a whim. Its literally the only thing that helped my lips and it didn't make them itch! Ive tried many of the trending lip products and none have worked better, for me. I didn't need to use a lot so the tube has lasted me forever.

reviews.headline: Only thing that helped my dry cracked lips !
reviews.comments: I was struggling so bad with dry, cracked lips and I got this on a whim. Its literally the only thing that helped my lips and it didn't make them itch! Ive tried many of the trending lip products and none have worked better, for me. I didn't need to use a lot so the tube has lasted me forever.

reviews.headline: One of my faves!
reviews.comments: I've really been into lip care lately and this is one of my favorites. It's not sticky and no weird scent. It does what it's supposed to do but it's a little pricey. I like it so much I bought another one to keep in my purse and one at home. I will keep repurchashing!

reviews.headline: Wanted to love
reviews.comments: I'm a huge fan of the moisture surge line and was so excited to try this, but after a week of consistent use I have determined that this product is causing breakouts around my lips. Small, painful pimples just on the edge of my lips that are very abnormal for my skin, and the only thing that I changed in my routine was adding this product. Be careful if you have sensitive skin!

reviews.headline: I buy this product at least four times a year
reviews.comments: I love this lip balm. For Christmas I bought it for my 3 sisters. Now they love it too.

reviews.headline: Eh
reviews.comments: It is quite mediocre really

reviews.headline: The only lip treatment that has worked for me!
reviews.comments: I live in the cold north and every winter my bottom lip cracks and peels.  I have used every lip treatment available and I may get one day of relief and then the peeling begins again.  I am vigilant about the ingredients and I do not use Chapstick.  I was reading a blog by a French makeup artist who has the same issue I have. Her recommendation as 'the only thing that works' and 'I have tried everything and this is the only one to give good results' is Clinique Moisture Surge Lip Hydro-Plump Treatment. I am so pleased I have ordered a second tube.  Thank you Clinique!

reviews.headline: In LOVE
reviews.comments: Like so many, I've tried a dozen+ lip butters, balms, nourishing glosses, etc. in the last couple of years. I love the Moisture Surge line and haven't found the right lip product that lasts on my perennially dry lips. The only ones that have gotten close are the Ole Henrikson and Laneige Lip Mask. This is the sleeper hit that no one seems to know about. The applicator is not ideal, but once on, it lasts a long time and is the best in the field, by far. No flavor or fun colors, but for someone really looking for function, this is the winner. Note: yes, it will be sticky, but again, FUNCTION over everything.

reviews.headline: Works great but it's basically Vaseline
reviews.comments: I have used this for several years when it comes as a freebie in my Clinique orders. I am definitely a devout Clinique fan. However, it needs to be stated that this is essentially a tiny, cute pink tube of petroleum with some little niceties mixed in. Vaseline is a fraction of the cost of this product. Save your hard earned money, or treat yourself to something with a better formula.

reviews.headline: My favorite!
reviews.comments: It works so well on my dry lips! No more peeling and cracking!

reviews.headline: Great
reviews.comments: Amazing mousture. Helped repair chapped lips. Gives lips a nice glossy plump look. Will be using this going forward - a must have for lip care!

reviews.headline: Most moisture my lips have ever felt!
reviews.comments: So I am doing project pan and im trying to finish products that I have had and not used or i dont typically reach for, this product happed to be one of them. Honestly i dont know how i never used it! I use it every night before bed and have ran out! This is definitely a product i will be repurchasing and i think i would be crazy not to. I have tried so many lip products and this is definitely in my top 3 best lip products! I would get reallh bad chapped lips and thej would bleed sometimes but this has helped me so much to the point where i feel like i do not have dry lips anymore and it lasts hours! I usually use it at nigbt when im not eating or talking and when i wake up my lips feel so smooth!
reviews.nickname: Ring me up, I'm buying this again!

reviews.headline: Clinique moisture surge for lips
reviews.comments: I use this product every year for my lips as I do not use lipstick. It is especially helpful during the winter months as skin and lips feel dryer. Always been happy with it.

media.headline: Favorite hydrating lip product
media.caption: Truly a favorite product of mine!

media.headline: Favorite hydrating lip product
media.caption: Keep one in the bathroom, one by my bed, and one in my purse!

faceoff_positive.comments: I didn't even notice that this is supposed to plump lips. I got it as a sample, and I thought it was just a balm. That was until I glanced in a mirror about an hour later on a day when I wasn't wearing any makeup. I was like, "Whaaaat?" This stuff not only gives a realistic, subtle plumping to my lips, it also seems to soften the fine lines around my mouth, and it lasts. With most plumping lip treatments, the effects seem to wear off in a couple of hours. Not this. It lasts for most of the day on me. It also doesn't sting me at all, unlike some other lip plumpers. I also have two spots that seem to always be dry, and this eliminated them in two days. The only downside that I can think of is that the full size tube is apparently not much bigger than the sample. But you don't need much. It might feel sticky if you apply too much. But you don't need much.
faceoff_positive.headline: It works!

faceoff_negative.comments: I was suckered by the "formulated with ceramides and shea butter" description, but I didn't think it was any better than your average drugstore lipbalm. I found it very drying for regular use and it made my chapped lips peel further. I tried using it after a shower as an occlusive but it didn't really last and my lips felt bald and dry within the hour...
faceoff_negative.headline: Disappointing

rollup.name: Moisture Surge Lip Hydro-Plump Treatment Lip Balm
